title: Shortest Path in a Grid with Obstacles Elimination
content:
Given a  grid, where each cell is either 0 (empty) or 1 (obstacle). In one step, you can move up, down, left or right from and to an empty cell.
Return the minimum number of steps to walk from the upper left corner  to the lower right corner  given that you can eliminate at most  obstacles. If it is not possible to find such walk return -1.
